verses.verse: There <S%H3426>is<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H7227>common<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> men: <S%H120><s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor,<s%> so that he <S%H2638>wanteth<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%> for his <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H183>desireth,<s%> yet <S%H430>God<s%> giveth him not <S%H7980>power<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>thereof,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> a <S%H376>stranger<s%> <S%H5237><s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> it: <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2483>disease.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3205>beget<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> children, and <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> so that the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H7945>be<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%> <S%H4480>with<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> that he <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6900>burial;<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> that an untimely <S%H5309>birth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he.

For <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H935>cometh<s%> in with <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and <S%H1980>departeth<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> he hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> any thing: <S%H2088>this<s%> hath more <S%H5183>rest<s%> than the <S%H4480>other.<s%> <S%H2088><s%>

Yea, <S%H432><s%> though he <S%H2421>live<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6471>twice<s%> told, yet hath he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2896>good:<s%> do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place?<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5999>labor<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is for his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H1571>yet<s%> the <S%H5315>appetite<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4390>filled.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> hath the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3148>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3684>fool?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> hath the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> that <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H2416>living?<s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than the <S%H4480>wandering<s%> <S%H1980><s%> of the <S%H5315>desire:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

That <S%H4100><s%> which hath <S%H7945>been<s%> <S%H1961><s%> is <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H3528>already,<s%> and it is <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H120>man:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3201>may<s%> he <S%H1777>contend<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him that is <S%H7945>mightier<s%> <S%H8623><s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> in this <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H4557>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H1892>vain<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> which he <S%H6213>spendeth<s%> as a <S%H6738>shadow?<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5046>tell<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun?<s%>
